originalTitle: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
title: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
content: The guitarist, composer and band leader fused Ghanaian music and funk to create tracks sampled around the world.

originalTitle: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
title: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
content: Eritrea has previously denied accusations that its soldiers are in Ethiopia supporting rebels.

originalTitle: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
title: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
content: Reports say Wiandre Pretorius, who last week said he survived an assassination attempt, shot himself.

originalTitle: Building collapse in northern Lebanon kills at least six
title: Building collapse in northern Lebanon kills at least six
content: Abdel Hamid Karimeh says seven people injured as rescue teams search for people trapped under rubble.

originalTitle: Man City fight back to win 2-1 at Liverpool and keep title hopes alive
title: Man City fight back to win 2-1 at Liverpool and keep title hopes alive
content: ‌Stoppage-time penalty from Erling Haaland gives City ‍dramatic win and narrows gap to ⁠leaders Arsenal to six points.

originalTitle: Ethiopia demands Eritrea ‘immediately withdraw’ troops from its territory
title: Ethiopia demands Eritrea ‘immediately withdraw’ troops from its territory
content: In recent months, Addis Ababa has accused Eritrea of supporting rebel fighters on Ethiopian soil.

originalTitle: Japan's governing party on course for landslide election win
title: Japan's governing party on course for landslide election win
content: A coalition led by current Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is expected to clinch a decisive win, an exit poll suggests.

originalTitle: Thai PM claims election victory with conservatives well ahead of rivals
title: Thai PM claims election victory with conservatives well ahead of rivals
content: The ruling conservatives defied opinion polls predicting a win for the reformist People's Party.

originalTitle: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
title: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
content: The suspects include the alleged gunman, Lyubomir Korba, whom Russia says fled to the UAE after the attack.

originalTitle: 'Killjoy' - did VAR get late drama in Liverpool v Man City right?
title: 'Killjoy' - did VAR get late drama in Liverpool v Man City right?
content: Manchester City's win at Liverpool ended in complete chaos - but did the referee and the VAR get Dominik Szoboszlai's red card right?

originalTitle: Smith's versatility and 'contagious' positivity driving Arsenal
title: Smith's versatility and 'contagious' positivity driving Arsenal
content: Olivia Smith's talent and versatility is helping to kick-start a drifting Arsenal side back into life as they chase silverware on three fronts.

originalTitle: Man City produce late comeback to beat Liverpool in chaotic finale
title: Man City produce late comeback to beat Liverpool in chaotic finale
content: Erling Haaland's 93rd-minute penalty gives Manchester City a crucial comeback win over Liverpool, who end the game with 10 men as Dominik Szoboszlai is sent off in stoppage time at Anfield.
